question: How do I book a product for renting?
answer: To start with your renting journey on RentoMojo, Ensure that you are signed up on Rentomojo. Choose your desired product from our wide range of collections. Once ready, tap on 'Book your plan' and proceed with the payment from the Cart page. Rest assured, your product will be delivered in the stipulated delivery time. For any further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app.

question: How do I pay my deposit?
answer: With RentoMojo, payments are super convenient and hassle-free. You can pay the security deposit while placing your order via debit card/credit card/net banking or eWallet. For any further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app.

question: How do I pay for my monthly rentals ?
answer: With RentoMojo, payments are super convenient and hassle-free. We will send a link to your registered email ID for a seamless payment option via your dashboard on the RentoMojo website or view here . You can opt for easy and secure payment options through net banking, debit card, or credit card to automatically deduct the rental amount from your account using auto-debit payment. Alternatively, you can also save up to 5% by opting for advance rental payment. View here. For any further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app.

question: When will I get my deposit back?
answer: On completion of your rental tenure, your product will be picked and checked for quality screening. Upon successful quality check, a refund will be initiated against the security deposit to your preferred account as per your convenience. Please note, no interest is paid on the deposit amount. In case you have questions about the deposit. In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app for any further assistance.

question: What are the terms of the rental subscription/contract?
answer: We have a simple contract that you need to e-signed using the delivery OTP when the product arrives at your home. The contract includes basic terms of renting, payment, refund, and damage policy. You can see the current terms and conditions here . For any further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app.

question: What is RentoMojo?
answer: RentoMojo is an online rental company that offers a smarter alternative to the conventional mode of ownership and buying. With RentoMojo, rent everything from furniture, appliances, electronics and fitness equipment at affordable rates. In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app to know more about renting and its benefits.

question: How does Renting work?
answer: RentoMojo works on a simple motto of ‘Live Smartly’ by offering easy access to a smarter and better lifestyle through renting. Browse through our exclusive collection of furniture, appliances, and electronics, choose your preferred tenure for renting and wait for the product to be delivered right at your doorstep—all without any hassle. In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app to know more about renting and its benefits.

question: How can I start renting?
answer: To start renting on RentoMojo, Simply sign up on RentoMojo Choose your desired product from our wide-collection of appliances, electronics, and furniture. Select your preferred tenure for the product and proceed with the checkout. Remember, longer tenure = lower rentals! Once done, complete the process using your preferred mode of payment. Once completed, complete the easy-KYC process to get your products delivered at your doorstep. In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app to know more about renting and its benefits.

question: What do I need to start renting?
answer: Our KYC process is mandatory and helps us to ensure a smooth renting process for you. We require the following documents during profile verification based on your profession. Rest assured, your information is safe with us. Working Professional Mandatory Documents* Pan Card Selfie Company name and Official Email id Self Employed Mandatory Documents* Pan Card Selfie GST number Freelance Mandatory Documents* Pan Card Bank statement Selfie Students Mandatory Documents* Govt id card Profile pic Bank statement College name Permanent Address proof Additional Documents We might also ask for the following docs in some cases Parents Bank Statemen Parents Govt id * 6 months Bank Statement might be asked to be uploaded in some cases In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app to know more about renting and its benefits.

question: I do not have the required documents. Are there any alternate documents I can submit for verification?
answer: Sorry, We currently do not take any alternate documents to complete the profile verification. You can find the complete list of documents required here . In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app to know more about renting and its benefits.

question: When do I pay for my first rental?
answer: Rentals at RentoMojo are simple and convenient. Rent for the previous month is due by the 10th of every month and can be paid online through your RentoMojo dashboard. Your first & last month's rent is calculated on a pro-rata basis from the date of delivery. The billing cycle is calculated from the 1st to the last day of the month. You can make your rental payments on your dashboard or opt for easy payments to get cashback. For further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app.

question: What happens if I make a late payment?
answer: Rentals must be paid before the 10th of every month. Additionally, we will send you a payment reminder with a link for easy and secure payments to avoid late fee charges. Please note, delayed payment of monthly rentals beyond the date shall attract a penal interest of 10% or a minimum 50 INR per month until the monthly rental is paid. Non-payment of monthly rental could result in termination of subscription and removal of the product. To avoid late payments, opt for auto-debit through our easy payments page and also receive cashback on your rental. For further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app.

question: What are the available modes of payment?
answer: With RentoMojo, payments are super convenient and hassle-free. We accept the below payment methods : Credit Card. Debit Card. Netbanking. UPI. Wallets. You can also opt for an easy and secure auto-debit option, using your credit card, debit card and net banking to automatically deduct the rental amount from your account on the 5th of every month. You can opt for auto-debit through our easy payments page and also receive cashback on your rental. For further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app.

question: Where can I find the payment link to pay for my rental?
answer: You can complete all payments on your dashboard on RentoMojo by following the below steps : Log in to your RentoMojo account on our website. Navigate to your rental dashboard under 'My Account.' Under 'Ledger,' find your rentals due for payment. Select 'Pay Now' and choose your preferred mode of payment. And you are all set! For further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app.

question: There was a payment issue with my deposit. What do I do?
answer: In case of a failed payment or any other technical error, the amount will be reversed back to your account within 3-4 working days. Please try alternative payment methods in case of repeated payment failure. For any further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app for your queries and concerns.

question: What is the approximate time for delivery?
answer: After completion of payment and the mandatory KYC procedure, our customer support team will reach out to you to schedule a delivery date as per your convenience. Once done, your order will be delivered within 24 - 48 hours. Please check the status of your order on your dashboard for further updates or view here. For any further assistance, please use the chat feature on the website/app.

question: What if I damage the product?
answer: Do not worry, we have got you covered. RentoMojo offers a damage waiver benefit to its Customers, who complete a minimum term of 3-12 months: Rs. 250, 13-24 months: Rs. 500 and 25-36 months: Rs. 1000 respectively. The damage waiver benefit provided is subject to the timely payment of all dues within the due date by the customer. While we cover minor damages, if a product is damaged to the point of hindering its usability, you will be liable to pay the rented product's total cost. For further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app for your queries.

question: Who will deliver and set up the product for me?
answer: Our delivery team will deliver and install the product as per your schedule and preference. Besides getting delivery, our delivery staff can assist you in setting up the furniture as per your convenience. For any further assistance, please use the chat feature on the website/app.

question: Is there a delivery and installation fee?
answer: Delivery and Installation fees are product specific and will be updated against your order before Deposit Payment. For any further assistance, please use the chat feature on the website/app.

question: How can I track my order?
answer: Once your order has been dispatched from our warehouse, you will receive an email and SMS with the tracking link to track your order status. You can also track your orders from your account on the RentoMojo website in the ‘ Undelivered Orders ’ section. For any further assistance, please use the chat feature on the website/app.

question: I want to retain the products that are being returned. What do I do?
answer: It is easy to retain the products after raising your closure request, just follow the below steps : Go to your dashboard, go to 'refund status' page. Choose your closure request and select the 'retain' option provided. Select the products you choose to retain. And confirm. In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app for any further assistance.

question: What if the condition of the product received is not satisfactory?
answer: We make sure all the products reach you without compromising on quality. There are a series of stringent quality checks that we undertake on every product before delivery. However, if you do not like the products at the time of delivery, you can return them, no questions asked. You can also raise a request from your RentoMojo dashboard for any query or concern or view here. For further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app for your queries.

question: What if the rented product gets dirty and requires cleaning?
answer: No problem! We offer provide cleaning (one time per year) of the furniture, after completion of 12 months of the subscription. The maintenance does not include any damage or breakdown due to mishandling. We will carry out the maintenance/repair of the Product within 3-5 working days after the request has been raised. In case, the issue is not resolved during repair; we shall provide a replacement for the Product. You can request for maintenance from your dashboard , by following the below steps : Log in to your RentoMojo account on our website or view here . Navigate to your rental dashboard under 'My Account.' Raise a request for maintenance under 'Requests' > ’Repair'. Update your request and confirm. For further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app for your queries.

question: How can I raise a request for repair or replacement?
answer: To request for a repair or replacement, follow the below steps : Log in to your RentoMojo account on our website or view here . Navigate to your rental dashboard under 'My Account.' Raise a request for Repair Request under 'Requests'>’New Request.' In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app for any further assistance.

question: What if I am moving to another place/house, will my products be relocated?
answer: Moving houses? No problem! We have you covered. Intra-city relocation: Place a request 2 weeks before you plan to move to your new home. We will process your request, pick-up, and deliver the products to your new house as per your preferred date and time for FREE. Inter-city relocation: Place a request 2 weeks before you move out of your current home. We will close your existing subscription, pick-up the products, do a quality-check to avoid any discrepancies, and deliver the products to your new home as per your preferred date and time for FREE. Please note, relocation is only available in RentoMojo’s list of operational cities including Mumbai, Pune, Bengaluru, Noida, Delhi, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, and Chennai. To relocate your products, follow the below steps : Log in to your RentoMojo account on our website. Click on 'New Request' and choose 'Relocate subscription'. Enter your new address and confirm details. A request will be raised and our team will contact you within 24 hours. You can track your request on the dashboard by clicking here - All Requests In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app for any further assistance.

question: What is RentoMoney?
answer: RentoMoney is an exclusive wallet currency that you can use for all your transactions on RentoMojo. You can refer someone and earn RentoMoney every time someone uses your code. To find your code, navigate to your dashboard, and look for ‘Referrals’ or view here . In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app for any further assistance.

question: How does the referral program work?
answer: RentoMojo’s referral code is a reward-based system. It is simple. You refer someone, and you earn RentoMoney every time someone uses your code. You can then use the same RentoMoney for all your transactions on RentoMojo. To find your code, navigate to your dashboard, and look for ‘Referrals’ or view here . To know more about referrals click here - Referrals terms and conditions

question: How can I use RentoMoney?
answer: You can then use the same RentoMoney to rent and avail discounts whenever you are renting more products on RentoMojo. Happy renting! To check the Rentomoney earned, you can visit your ledger view or click here .

question: How do I use my referral code?
answer: RentoMojo’s referral code is a reward-based system. Simply share your code with your friends and colleagues and avail RentoMoney in your account every time someone signs up on RentoMojo with your referral code. You can find your code in your dashboard under ‘ Referrals ’.

question: How can I earn a referral bonus?
answer: You and your friend will receive INR 25 each as a sign-up bonus when your friend signs up as a first-time user on RentoMojo by applying your unique referral code. You will be credited with an INR 200 referral bonus when your friend’s order is successfully delivered. To know more about referrals click here - Referrals terms.

question: Can I transfer my subscription to someone else?
answer: Yes, you can. You and the person you choose to transfer the order to will have to confirm and accept the change in ownership. In addition to that, he/she will be required to go through our profile verification process to process the transfer. To transfer your subscription follow the below steps : Log in to your RentoMojo account on our website. Click on ' New Request ' and choose 'Transfer Ownership'. Enter the details of the person you wish to transfer your products to. And confirm. In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app to know more about the process to transfer the ownership of your rented products.

question: Is it possible to extend my subscription tenure?
answer: Yes. If you wish to extend your rental tenure, follow the below steps : Log in to your RentoMojo account on our website or view here . Navigate to your rental dashboard under 'My Account.' Raise a request for under 'Requests'>’New Request.' Choose 'Extend Subscription' and follow the instructions to extend the tenure of your rented products. In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app to know more about the process to transfer the ownership of your rented products.

question: Is there an advance or deposit required for renting a product?
answer: Yes. We charge a nominal amount as a deposit for safeguarding the product. Do not worry, though. This is fully refundable if the products are returned in good condition. In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app to know more about renting and its benefits.

question: Which cities does RentoMojo operate in?
answer: We are currently operational in eight cities: Bengaluru, Mumbai, Pune, Delhi, Noida, Gurgaon, Hyderabad & Chennai. In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app to know more about renting and its benefits.

question: Where can I find more information on my monthly rental payments?
answer: You can find all rental payments related information on your dashboard on RentoMojo by following the below steps : Log in to your RentoMojo account on our website. Navigate to your rental dashboard under 'My Account.' Under 'Ledger,' find your rental payment-related information For further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app.

question: How do I set up auto-deduct from my credit card for rental payments?
answer: You can also opt for an easy and secure auto-debit option, using your credit card to automatically deduct the rental amount from your account on the 5th of every month. You can opt for auto-debit through our easy payments page and also receive cashback on your rental. For further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app.

question: Can I reschedule my delivery?
answer: Yes, you can. Please raise a request on your RentoMojo dashboard to reschedule your order. Please note, the delivery date is subject to the availability of the product. Click on 'New Request' and choose 'General Queries'. Select the 'Delivery and pickup related' and choose from subtype ‘Reschedule delivery’. Add your issue or preferred delivery date. And submit. For further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app to share your preferred day and delivery time.

question: What if I was not at home at the time of delivery?
answer: You can request for a reschedule the delivery based on your preference and convenience from your RentoMojo dashboard . Please note, the delivery date is subject to the availability of the product. In case you want someone else to take the delivery of your product, please share the OTP from your registered number with them at the time of delivery to ensure a smooth delivery process. For further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app to share your preferred day and delivery time.

question: Is the relocation really free?
answer: Yes. Free relocation can be availed anytime during your rental tenure.

question: I have issues with my invoice/order. What do I do?
answer: If you have any issues with your invoices, follow the below steps to know more. Log in to your RentoMojo account on our website or view here . Navigate to your rental dashboard under 'My Account.' Choose ‘Ledger’ to view all upcoming and previous rentals payments. We provide a breakup of all invoice generated to date on your account. If you have any further queries you can raise a request by clicking here - Raise a request Submit your query and our executives will contact you within 24 working hours. In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app for any further assistance.

question: Is there a cap on the referral benefit?
answer: You can earn up to INR 1,000, which is the maximum referral bonus for the referrer. You can earn up to INR 800 on successful orders and INR 200 on successful sign-ups. To know more about referrals click here - Referrals terms.

question: How do I close my rental subscription?
answer: Change of plans? No problem. To close your subscription, follow the below steps : Log in to your RentoMojo account on our website. Click on 'New Request' and choose 'Close Subscription'. Select the products you want to return. Pick a preferred return date. And confirm. In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app to know more.

question: How do I cancel my order?
answer: Change of plans? No problem. To cancel your subscription, Log in to your RentoMojo account on our website. Raise a request for cancellation under 'Requests'> General queries’ > ‘Order related’ > ‘cancel order’. Choose 'Close subscription' and follow the instructions to cancel your request successfully. In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app.

question: My order was canceled. What do I do?
answer: Your order might be cancelled due to a few reasons like stock availability, profile verification, or delivery location not currently serviceable. To know more about your order status, view here . For further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app.

question: I want to change/modify my order. What do I do?
answer: Change of plans? No problem. To modify your order, Log in to your RentoMojo account on our website. Click on 'New Request' and choose 'General Queries'. Select the 'Order related' and modification you need. And confirm. For any further assistance, please use the chat feature on the website/app.

question: I have not received my order yet. What do I do?
answer: After completion of payment and the mandatory KYC procedure, your order will be delivered within 24 - 48 hours. You can also check the status of your order from your RentoMojo account on our website. For any further assistance, please use the chat feature on the website/app.

question: Is there a contract that I have to sign?
answer: RentoMojo has a simple contract that you need to e-sign when the product is delivered to your home. The contract includes basic terms of renting, payment, refund, and damage policy. You can read more about it here . At the time of delivery, we will send you an OTP to share with the RentoMojo agent for order verification and contract confirmation. In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app to know more about renting and its benefits.

question: How long will it take to verify my profile?
answer: Most profiles get verified instantly on the submission of all the required documents. In some cases, we might need some extra time to verify the documents but the process will be completed within 24 hours of document submission. Ensure that all your documents are submitted correctly to have a smooth renting experience.

question: My KYC process/profile on RentoMojo is not verified yet. What do I do?
answer: Most profiles get verified instantly on the submission of all the required documents. If your profile still is not verified, follow the steps below : Log in to your RentoMojo account on our website or view here . Navigate to your rental dashboard under ' My Account '. Check under ‘ Undelivered Orders ’ for the status of your order. For any further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app.

question: What happens if I make a late payment?
answer: Rentals must be paid before the 10th of every month. Additionally, we will send you a payment reminder with a link for easy and secure payments to avoid late fee charges. Please note, delayed payment of monthly rentals beyond the date shall attract a penal interest of 10% or a minimum 50 INR per month until the monthly rental is paid. Non-payment of monthly rental could result in termination of subscription and removal of the product.

question: Can I cancel my subscription before the end of my rental tenure?
answer: Yes, you can. In case of early termination of your order/one or more products from the order, you can request for closure by informing us 3 days prior to the selected preferred date. You will be liable to pay early closure charges as per the contract. You can close your order/one or more products by following the below steps : Log in to your RentoMojo account on our website. Click on 'New Request' and choose 'Close Subscription'. Select the products you want to return. Pick a preferred return date. And confirm. Early closure charges will vary based on the category of the product and the committed tenure. To avoid early closure charges, you could look at the following options If you are looking to close because you are relocating, you can continue your subscription from the new place. We will do the relocation for you as long as Rentomojo is operational in the new city. You could also transfer the subscription to someone else and the early closure charges will no longer be applicable If there are any other reasons, do get in touch with us and we would be happy to help you out in any way we can. In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app to know more.

question: My card was declined during the payment process. What do I do?
answer: We accept all major credit and debit card networks like Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and RuPay. In case of a failed payment or any other technical error, the amount will be reversed to your account in 3-4 working days. Please use a different method of payment in case of repeated payment failure. We accept the below payment methods : Credit Card. Debit Card. Netbanking. UPI. Wallets. For further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app for your queries.

question: Can I close my subscription and return the product early?
answer: Yes, you can. In case of early termination of your order/one or more products from the order, you can request for closure by informing us 3 days prior to the selected preferred date. You will be liable to pay early closure charges as per the contract. You can close your order/one or more products by following the below steps : Log in to your RentoMojo account on our website. Click on 'New Request' and choose 'Close Subscription'. Select the products you want to return. Pick a preferred return date. And confirm. Early closure charges will vary based on the category of the product and the committed tenure. For Furniture and Appliances Min 3-month tenure: 0.5 month’s rent Min 6-month tenure: 1 month’s rent Min 12-month tenure: 1.5 month’s rent Min 24-month tenure : 2 month’s rent For Electronics and Fitness Min 3 month: 0.25 month’s rent Min 6-month: 0.5 month’s rent Min 12 month: 1 month’s rent Min 18 month: 2 month’s rent To avoid early closure charges, you could look at the following options If you are looking to close because you are relocating, you can continue your subscription from the new place. We will do the relocation for you as long as Rentomojo is operational in the new city. You could also transfer the subscription to someone else and the early closure charges will no longer be applicable If there are any other reasons, do get in touch with us and we would be happy to help you out in any way we can. In case of any doubts or queries, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app to know more.

question: What is the process to initiate a refund for my security deposit?
answer: If you do not like the product you receive on delivery, you can return it right away. To raise a return request, Log in to your RentoMojo account on our website. Click on 'New Request' and choose 'Close Subscription'. Select the products you want to return. Pick a preferred return date a nd to confirm. We will pick up the product and complete a quality check on your product within 24 hours. We will initiate the refund of your deposit within 24 hours post quality check. Once the refund process is initiated, you will receive the amount in your source bank account within 7-10 working days. For further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app for your queries.

question: How long will it take for my refund to be processed?
answer: Once the refund is initiated, you will receive the amount in your source bank account within 7-10 working days. For further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app for your queries.

question: I am not happy with the settlement amount given to me. What do I do?
answer: All products at RentoMojo pass through stringent measures to ensure the correct evaluation of the deposit to be refunded to you. In case of issues with the settlement, please raise a request here . For further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app for your queries.

question: Where can I update my bank details?
answer: You can update your bank details at using the following steps : While closing your rental subscription, You will be prompted to provide your bank details to complete the settlement process. You can also update your bank details at the time of refund confirmation on your dashboard. For further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app for your queries.

question: Do I have to submit any additional documents on delivery?
answer: No. You do not have to submit any additional documents. RentoMojo has a simple e-contract that you need to sign when the product is delivered to your home. The contract includes basic terms of renting, payment, refund, and damage policy. You can read more about it here . At the time of delivery, we will send you an OTP to share with the RentoMojo agent for order verification and contract confirmation. For further assistance, we encourage you to use the chat feature on the website/app to share your preferred day and delivery time.
